description: An app for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection.

instructions.start: PhotoPrism is a server-based application for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection. It makes use of the latest technologies to automatically tag and find pictures without getting in your way.
instructions.end: Photoprism is deployed and available as $$cap_appname. Please also enable Websockets in the Caprover UI. When you log in the default password is 'photoprism'

variables.label: Photoprism Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/photoprism/photoprism/tags
